text: A Danegeld to be Paid

Your guardsmen who patrol the border of your kingdom bring a panicked report back to your court that a horde of dangerous looking Northmen have been sighted setting up camp within your lands. Your emissaries are sent out to meet them. They bring back demands that the Northmen will happily accept a danegeld to depart from your lands peacefully, or they will otherwise claim their fortune at the point of their swords. What will be our response?
We will pay the danegeld
We will drive them from our lands
Face and gold are a small price to pay for avoiding a needless war.
Neither bribe nor quarter will be given to invaders!
A Danegeld to be Paid

Your guardsmen who patrol the border of your kingdom bring a panicked report back to your court that a horde of dangerous looking Danes have been sighted setting up camp within your lands. Your emissaries are sent out to meet them. They bring back demands that the warriors will happily accept a danegeld to depart from your lands peacefully, or they will otherwise claim their fortune at the point of their swords. Seeing as we are of common blood, perhaps they could be made to see reason?
We will pay the danegeld
We will drive them from our lands
They can attack our enemies
They can join our warriors in battle
Face and gold are a small price to pay for avoiding a needless war.
Neither bribe nor quarter will be given to invaders!
Perhaps we could turn their aggression to our enemies instead?
Their warriors will make a welcome addition to the King's forces
Forging Focus
After a period of time the smithies in our kingdom have an excess of resources that can be used for extra projects as directed by the King. What shall we instruct them to focus on?
Focus on gifts for the King
Focus on weapons for the army
Focus on tools for the workers
Gifts can increase authority and prestige
This will help refill the recruitment pools.
Provides a nice economic boost.
A Plethora of Hunters
So many young men in our Kingdom have been hunting from the time they are children and have become adepts with shooting a bow. Perhaps we could find a way to put their skills to good use?
The Kingdom needs warriors
The Kingdom needs food
They will rain death on our enemies!
The extra meat will be welcome
The Settlement is Occupied by Foreign Warriors

Our forces moved into the settlement but encountered a small band of foreign mercenaries who have set up camp already. We could easily drive them away but perhaps we could entice them to join our forces?
They can stay
Drive them away
They will become recruitable as mercenaries
This will likely damage our relationship with other Viking factions
The Settlement is Occupied by Foreign Warriors

Our forces moved into the settlement but encountered a small band of foreign mercenaries who have set up camp already. We could easily drive them away but perhaps we could entice them to join our forces?
Drive them out
Appoint some of them is land owners
The English in our Kingdom will be thankful
Our army will be thankful
Our Ports Swell with Foreigners

Word of our recent successes have spread driving traders, slavers, and mercenaries to our ports. The business has certainly been welcome, our docks buzz with activity as ships are constantly coming and going and men toil unloading cargo for trading. But along with increased trading also comes increased drunkenness, burglary, and even murder. The subjects of our kingdom do not enjoy a rising influx of foreigners and their filthy habits.
Allow the foreigners in our ports
Strict caps on trading
Our coffers will rejoice... our people not as much.
The extra coin is not worth destabilizing the Kingdom
Our Ports Swell with Foreigners

Word of our recent successes have spread driving traders, slavers, and mercenaries to our ports. The business has certainly been welcome, our docks buzz with activity as ships are constantly coming and going and men toil unloading cargo for trading. But along with increased trading also comes increased drunkenness, burglary, and even murder. The subjects of our kingdom do not enjoy a rising influx of foreigners and their filthy habits.
Allow the foreigners in our ports
Our army will be thankful
Strict caps on trading
The English in our Kingdom will be thankful
Foreign Mercenaries
News of war have spread, driving sellswords to our lands, seeking their fortune.
We will hire some of them
We have no need of mercenaries
It will be good to hire professional warriors
Let us hope we don't seem them in the camp of the enemy
Defeated Viking Warriors
Despite their defeat at our hands, the remains of the defeated Viking army have splintered and settled in our lands. Perhaps we could convince them to come fight for us instead?
They may stay if they fight
Banish them from the Kingdom
A man will fight to defend his home
Our lands will be rid of their filth
